item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://localhost:8000.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Login
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Kia Ora and Welcome to Haukainga Home Winds.

Login now to book one of our amazing properties!

item.title: Privacy Policy

item.content:encoded:

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://localhost:8000.

item.title: Privacy Policy & Terms of Use
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Privacy Policy

Information We Collect

We collect and process various types of information to provide you with the best possible experience on our platform. The information we collect may include:

  • Personal Information: This may include your name, email address, contact information, and other details you provide when booking accommodations or creating an account in our platform.

  • Payment Information: We may collect payment details to process your bookings and transactions securely. However, we do not store full payment card information.

  • Accommodation Preferences: Information about your accommodation preferences and any special requests you may have.

  • Communications: Records of your communications with us, such as emails, messages, or other correspondence.

  • Usage Data: Information about how you use our platform, including your interactions with listings and other users.

  • Device and Log Information: Data about your device, browser, IP address, and other technical information for analytics and security purposes.

How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:

  • Providing Services: To facilitate bookings, personalize your experience, and provide customer support.

  • Communications: To send you booking confirmations, updates, and important service information.

  • Improvements: To analyze and improve our platform, services, and user experience.

  • Safety and Security: To monitor and enhance the security of our platform and services.

  • Legal Compliance: To comply with legal requirements and resolve disputes.

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

Security and Data Retention

We implement security measures to protect your data, but no method of data transmission or storage is entirely secure. We retain your information as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy.

How long we retain your data

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

The personal information provided by user for account creation will be stored as long as the account is in use. However, the bookings' details will be stored as long as we needed for business purposes according to Principle 9 of NZ Privacy Act 2020.

Link: https://privacy.org.nz/tools/knowledge-base/view/628

What rights you have over your data

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Updates to Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time, and changes will be posted on our platform. Your continued use of Haukainga HomeWinds after such changes constitute your acceptance of the revised policy.

Terms of Use

Your Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using Haukainga HomeWinds, you agree to comply with these Terms of Use and any additional terms and policies posted on our platform.

Use of Our Platform

You may use our platform for personal and non-commercial purposes. You agree not to use our services for any illegal, harmful, or unauthorized activities. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information, and you agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use or breach of security.

Bookings and Payments

When you make bookings through Haukainga HomeWinds, you agree to provide accurate and up-to-date information. Payment transactions are processed securely, and by making a booking, you authorize us to charge your payment method for the total amount of the reservation. Cancellation policies and additional terms may apply and are determined by the property owners and managers.

Content and Intellectual Property

All content on our platform, including text, images, logos, and trademarks, is protected by intellectual property rights. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute our content without our explicit consent. User-generated content, such as reviews and comments, should not violate these Terms of Use or infringe on the rights of others.

Termination

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to Haukainga HomeWinds if you violate these terms or engage in any harmful or fraudulent activities on our platform.

Disclaimers and Limitation of Liability

Haukainga HomeWinds provides its services "as is," and we do not warrant that our platform will be error-free or uninterrupted. We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services.

Governing Law and Jurisdiction

These Terms of Use are governed by the laws of New Zealand. Any disputes or claims arising out of or relating to these terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in New Zealand.

Changes to Terms

We may update these Terms of Use from time to time, and changes will be posted on our platform. Your continued use of Haukainga HomeWinds after such changes constitute your acceptance of the revised terms.

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time, and changes will be posted on our platform. Your continued use of Haukainga HomeWinds after such changes constitute your acceptance of the revised policy.

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Ko Wai Mtou | About Us

Haukainga HomeWinds

Kia ora! Nau mai haere mai Haukainga HomeWinds, your gateway to the rich cultural heritage and breathtaking natural beauty of New Zealand. Our journey began with a deep appreciation for the Maori way of life, the awe-inspiring landscapes of Aotearoa, and a vision to create an immersive experience that celebrates both.

At Haukainga HomeWinds, we are on a mission to bridge the gap between travelers and the enchanting world of Maori traditions, while offering unique and comfortable accommodations that showcase the splendor of New Zealand's diverse landscapes. Our commitment is to provide a platform that not only connects you with remarkable places to stay but also offers an opportunity to immerse yourself in the Maori culture, as we firmly believe that understanding the indigenous peoples and their heritage enhances the overall travel experience.

The name "Haukainga HomeWinds" is inspired by the Maori concept of "hau kainga," which represents the welcoming winds of one's homeland. We want you to feel the warmth and hospitality of home even when you're far from your own. We believe that every traveler should be treated as an honored guest, and our name reflects this commitment.

Haukainga HomeWinds is more than just a property booking website.

it's a cultural journey. Here's what sets us apart:

  1. Maori-Themed Accommodations: Our listings are handpicked to ensure that you experience the unique blend of modern comfort and Maori tradition. From cozy marae-inspired lodges to stylish contemporary homes with Maori artwork, we offer a range of accommodations that celebrate the Maori heritage.

  2. Cultural Experiences: We don't just stop at providing accommodation; we connect you with Maori cultural experiences, such as traditional haka performances, guided tours to significant cultural sites, and workshops on Maori arts and crafts.

  3. Local Knowledge: Our team includes experts with a deep understanding of New Zealand's geography, culture, and history. We can help you plan a trip that immerses you in the real New Zealand experience, not just the touristy spots.

  4. Sustainability: We are committed to sustainable and eco-friendly tourism. We encourage responsible travel practices and support accommodations that follow sustainable tourism principles.

Haukainga HomeWinds<\/strong><\/h1>","align":"center","text_color":"#F30404","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Roboto","typography_font_weight":"400","typography_letter_spacing":{"unit":"px","size":0.6,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"275251b","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Kia ora! Nau mai haere mai Haukainga HomeWinds, your gateway to the rich cultural heritage and breathtaking natural beauty of New Zealand. Our journey began with a deep appreciation for the Maori way of life, the awe-inspiring landscapes of Aotearoa, and a vision to create an immersive experience that celebrates both.<\/p>

At Haukainga HomeWinds, we are on a mission to bridge the gap between travelers and the enchanting world of Maori traditions, while offering unique and comfortable accommodations that showcase the splendor of New Zealand's diverse landscapes. Our commitment is to provide a platform that not only connects you with remarkable places to stay but also offers an opportunity to immerse yourself in the Maori culture, as we firmly believe that understanding the indigenous peoples and their heritage enhances the overall travel experience.<\/p>

The name \"Haukainga HomeWinds\" is inspired by the Maori concept of \"hau kainga,\" which represents the welcoming winds of one's homeland. We want you to feel the warmth and hospitality of home even when you're far from your own. We believe that every traveler should be treated as an honored guest, and our name reflects this commitment.<\/p>","align":"justify","text_color":"#000000","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Roboto","typography_font_weight":"400","typography_letter_spacing":{"unit":"px","size":0.6,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":false},{"id":"7fac275","elType":"container","settings":{"flex_direction":"row","flex_gap":{"unit":"px","size":0,"column":"0","row":"0"},"min_height":{"unit":"px","size":50,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"isInner":false},{"id":"3f8f9d5","elType":"container","settings":{"flex_direction":"row","flex_gap":{"unit":"px","size":0,"column":"0","row":"0"},"min_height":{"unit":"px","size":600,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[{"id":"d67a970","elType":"container","settings":{"flex_direction":"column","content_width":"full","width":{"unit":"%","size":47},"_flex_size":"none","_element_width":"initial"},"elements":[{"id":"904969e","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Haukainga HomeWinds is more than just a property booking website.<\/h3>","align":"justify","text_color":"#FF0000"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"4f459dd","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

it's a cultural journey. Here's what sets us apart:<\/h4>
  1. Maori-Themed Accommodations:<\/strong> Our listings are handpicked to ensure that you experience the unique blend of modern comfort and Maori tradition. From cozy marae-inspired lodges to stylish contemporary homes with Maori artwork, we offer a range of accommodations that celebrate the Maori heritage.<\/li>

  2. Cultural Experiences:<\/strong> We don't just stop at providing accommodation; we connect you with Maori cultural experiences, such as traditional haka performances, guided tours to significant cultural sites, and workshops on Maori arts and crafts.<\/p><\/li>

  3. Local Knowledge:<\/strong> Our team includes experts with a deep understanding of New Zealand's geography, culture, and history. We can help you plan a trip that immerses you in the real New Zealand experience, not just the touristy spots.<\/p><\/li>

  4. Sustainability:<\/strong> We are committed to sustainable and eco-friendly tourism. We encourage responsible travel practices and support accommodations that follow sustainable tourism principles.<\/p><\/li><\/ol>","align":"justify","text_color":"#000000"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true},{"id":"5450177","elType":"container","settings":{"flex_direction":"column","content_width":"full","width":{"unit":"%","size":6.288},"_flex_size":"none","_element_width":"initial"},"elements":[],"isInner":true},{"id":"149b499","elType":"container","settings":{"flex_direction":"column","content_width":"full","width":{"unit":"%","size":46.334},"background_background":"classic","background_image":{"url":"http:\/\/localhost\/wordpress\/wp-content\/uploads\/2023\/11\/500pxRF_173514057.jpg","id":200,"size":"","alt":"","source":"library"},"background_position":"center center","background_repeat":"no-repeat","background_size":"cover","_flex_size":"none","_element_width":"initial"},"elements":[],"isInner":true}],"isInner":false}]

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
He tangata takahi manuhiri, he marae puehu

A person who mistreats his guest has a dusty house.

Property Rental - Made in New Zealand

Experience New Zealand's hospitality!

We offer various bookable properties, which will make your journey around New Zealand a whole lot nicer.

Support local property owners!

All properties are owned by New Zealand citizens!

Choose sustainability!

Haukainga Home Winds pays high focus on sustainability to provide environment-friendly accommodation options
